snippet: Nasty, boring, folkloric or funny, chants by soccer fans can create momentum, help build a rally for a goal, overwhelm an opponent or distract a referee.
abstract: Chants in soccer are part of the game for fans of teams worldwide; whether nasty, boring, folkloric or funny, chants by fans can create momentum, help build a rally for a goal, overwhelm an opponent or distract a referee; a team’s most ardent fans are often called its 12th man, as important to the outcome of a match as the 11 players on the field; fans will be out in force for the quarterfinals of the Champions League, Europe’s most prestigious tournament.
lead_paragraph: Nasty, boring, folkloric or funny, chants by soccer fans can create momentum, help build a rally for a goal, overwhelm an opponent or distract a referee.

headline.seo: Soccer Fans’ Chants Fire Up Home Team or Slight the Opponent
